Chap. 24 - Love in the Home
[SEE CHAPTER32, "INFATUATION AND BLIND LOVE."]


     Source of True Human Affection.--Our affection for one another springs from our common relation to God. We are one family, we love one another as He loved us. When compared with this true, sanctified, disciplined affection, the shallow courtesy of the world, the meaningless expression of effusive friendship, are as chaff to the wheat.--Lt 63, 1896. (SD 101.)
